name: Demonic Deviation
summary: This wad contains 11 maps replacing Maps01-11, these are pretty much tech based themed though they can be separated by the traditional map07 intermission screen, the first six are more earth base style and revolve around a power facility, the final five are more military base style. There will be a lot of familiairty from some past works of mine (Maps 07 and 10) or indeed other peoples works from the past (Map04 and perhaps 11). This wad is limit removing (complevel 2)
